attributes.action: Stop the removal of the ban on usage of neonicotinoids post-Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: The use of neonicotinoids has a devastating impact on the bee population which is already at risk. We’ve lost a third of the bee population in the UK in the last decade - we cannot let it be further decimated by the usage of these harmful pesticides. This ban which was previously supported by the UK parliament is being revoked now that we are exiting the EU, and will have a horrendous impact on the pollinators in UK wildlife if it is allowed to continue.
attributes.background: Stop the removal of the ban on usage of neonicotinoids in British farming post-Brexit to protect the bees and other pollinators in the UK.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Overturn the decision to allow the use of neonicotinoid pesticides
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569214

Continue the ban on the use of Neonicotinoids
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563943
